name: The Goblin Menace
description: Help the village defend against increasing goblin attacks.

steps.description: Talk to Elder Grimwald about the goblin problem

dialogue.greeting: Adventurer! The goblins have been growing bolder. We need your help!
dialogue.objective: The goblins have been raiding our supply wagons. Kill 5 goblins to send them a message.

steps.instructions: Head east of the village to find goblins

steps.description: Collect a piece of goblin mail as proof
steps.instructions: Search the goblin bodies for armor

steps.description: Return to Elder Grimwald with the goblin mail

dialogue.completion: Excellent work! This should keep the goblins at bay for a while. Take this reward for your bravery.

completionText: The village is safe from goblin raids, at least for now. The elder is grateful for your help.
